thread.title: Gen X conquers Twitter with #1980sIn4Words
thread.title_full: Gen X conquers Twitter with #1980sIn4Words | www.ajc.com

author: Ana Santos
title: Gen X conquers Twitter with #1980sIn4Words
text:
Michael Jackson, hairspray and the Jamaica national bobsled team. Those are some defining pop culture moments of the 1980s.
Twitter users took to the social media site Saturday morning to add thousands of more examples using the hashtag # 1980sIn4Words .
Here are some things only people who grew up in the 1980s will truly understand.
MTV was music television. #1980sIn4Words @duranduran @AnnieLennox @MotleyCrue @BillyIdol pic.twitter.com/ZasFpm6Suk
— Rebel Yeti (@RebelYeti) October 17, 2015 #1980sIn4Words #boomers came of age pic.twitter.com/6RDJdRfxsw
— Dan Stepel (@lastbabyboomer) October 17, 2015 This was gym wear #1980sIn4Words pic.twitter.com/w7gkPmd4Eb
— joshingstern (@joshingstern) October 17, 2015 #1980sIn4Words Whatchu talkin bout Willis ? pic.twitter.com/MHhVzhfGAQ
— Owen Myers (@OwenMyers01) October 17, 2015 Who you gonna call? #1980sIn4Words pic.twitter.com/alnSwkPyly
— Lynn Sheridan (@TheEarthLynn) October 17, 2015 "Tear down this wall." #1980sIn4Words pic.twitter.com/cscnFmgGbp
— Werner Twertzog (@WernerTwertzog) October 17, 2015 #1980sIn4Words I pity the fool! pic.twitter.com/0yZr0VjeaS
— DIE-rick RoBOOertson (@DarickR) October 17, 2015 We don't need roads. #1980sIn4Words pic.twitter.com/FOYz7aF5qg
— DeniseVlogs (@DeniseVlogs) October 17, 2015 #1980sIn4Words A Real Mix Tape pic.twitter.com/KBwV8dy4Cq
— IG: Dizzy Dortch (@DizzyDortch) October 17, 2015 Business = Front Party = Back #1980sIn4Words pic.twitter.com/nE5Mwmg8Rg
— TrivWorks (@TrivWorks) October 17, 2015 The Outsiders were everything #1980sIn4Words pic.twitter.com/8HRLSHKUkV
— Charisse (@CharisseMSRD) October 17, 2015 The best iPhone ever #1980sIn4Words pic.twitter.com/REGtOclmG1
— Diane N. Sevenay (@Diane_7A) October 17, 2015 Goonies never say die #1980sIn4Words pic.twitter.com/0Jtrzix60e
— Jared Montana (@Jarmadillos) October 17, 2015 What did we miss? Comment below to share more #1980sIn4Words memories.
